cortex.analysis package¶

Submodules¶

cortex.analysis.load_mri module¶

Utilities for handling nifti files.

cortex.analysis.load_mri.find_niftis(source)[source]¶

Finds nifti files in a directory.

Parameters:source (str) – The source directory for niftis
Returns:List of file paths.
Return type:list
cortex.analysis.load_mri.load_niftis(source_dir, out_dir, name='mri', patterns=None)[source]¶

Loads niftis from a directory.

Saves the data, paths, mask, and sites.

Parameters:
  • source_dir (str) – Directory of nifti files.
  • out_dir (str) – Output directory for saving arrays, etc.
  • name (str) – Name of dataset.
  • patterns (Optional[list]) – list of glob for filtering files.
cortex.analysis.load_mri.main(args=None)[source]¶

Main routine.

cortex.analysis.load_mri.make_argument_parser()[source]¶

Parses command-line arguments.

cortex.analysis.load_mri.read_niftis(file_list)[source]¶

Reads niftis from a file list into numpy array.

Parameters:file_list (int) – List of file paths.
Returns:Array of data from nifti file list. list: New file list with bad files filtered.
Return type:numpy.array
cortex.analysis.load_mri.save_mask(data, out_path)[source]¶

Save mask of data.

Parameters:
  • data (numpy.array) – Data to mask
  • out_path (str) – Output path for mask.

cortex.analysis.read_fmri module¶

Utility for handling fMRI data.

cortex.analysis.read_fmri.load_niftis(source_dir, out_dir, name='fmri', patterns=None)[source]¶

Loads niftis from a directory.

Saves the data, paths, mask, and sites.

Parameters:
  • source_dir (str) – Directory of nifti files.
  • out_dir (str) – Output directory for saving arrays, etc.
  • name (str) – Name of dataset.
  • patterns (Optional[list]) – list of glob for filtering files.
